ubirch.send:
Send the actual message, signed and encoded. Data is encoded in message pack format:
INT[DeviceId]BYTES[Signature+Message]. The maximum message size is 440 bytes.
ubirch.sendNumber: Send a number to the backend server. Encodes key/value as a json message.
ubirch.sendString: Send a string to the backend server. Encodes key/value as a json message.
ubirch.setSignKey: Set secret key to sign messages as a hex encoded string.
ubirch.showDeviceInfo: Show Calliope device id and the secret for communication.
